metadata.name: Ordinals Sai No Kawara #1721
metadata.description:
First ever escrow and safe trading for BTC Ordinals.
Revenue share and bridging with the ethereum collections to BTC ordinals NFT later.

Scams on OTC transfers and even malicious scripts are being deployed by shady individuals and or groups to the bitcoin network with the advent of the ordinal technology

We are here to mitigate and reduce the risks as possible to create a safer environment to trade Bitcoin NFTs.

Decentralization should be trustless.

And what the heck, we're going to use AI generated Anime art, cause I'm a weeb and I'm a proud weeb.
